job.title: Data Scientist (100% Remote)

learning for feature engineering  Experience communicating technical concepts to expert and lay audiencesnbsppp 2 years coding experience Python preferrednbsppp Experience in data engineering A passion for empirical research and for answering hard questions with datanbsppp Proven record of solving challenging problems in academia andor industrynbsppp Eagerness to collaborate with both
